name: Holomobs v0.0.0 prealpha
description:
COME SAY HI! The Development team would love to hear from you as they are starting hard at working on the core design and fleshing out the game.

https://discord.gg/V8fdYDRz6z

(To play, make sure the project is in focus):

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Enter Key to force the encounter demo
  • Scroll wheel to zoom in and out, you can also resize the window

Holomobs is a entirely new take on the monster battle genre!

It will be a MMO unlike never before seen.

It's time for a new  monster  battler to rise up, and bring experiences to players who are willing to love it's world and it's monsters. With a huge focus on player sociability, Holomobs will take massive inspiration from these beloved titles:

  • Zelda
  • Club Penguin
  • Pokémon
  • Animal Crossing
